ygData.subject: RE: Quick Question (and we've been down this road be fore :)  )
ygData.msgSnippet: Erudin = Crimson Red Sr. App. Robe ... and FYI it s stats are better than the Sr. App. Robes bought in Freeport. ... From: foo [mailto:marvin@shaftnet.org]
ygData.messageBody:
Erudin = Crimson Red Sr. App. Robe
... and FYI it's stats are better than the Sr. App. Robes bought in
Freeport.

-----Original Message-----
From: foo [mailto:marvin@...]
Sent: Monday, November 15, 1999 12:03 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Quick Question (and we've been down this road
before :) )


From: foo <marvin@...>

On Mon, 15 Nov 1999, PHAEDRA WHITLOCK wrote:
> Freeport = Glaring Magenta-Violet
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
> What towns have what colored robes?
> Neriak= Dk Red
> Akanon = Gold
> Felwithe = ?Green?

Felwithe is green. and Neriak necro guild has a dark purple/black.

Qeynos is blue
Erudin necro is brown
Erudin is yellow(i think)

Stannis Starslyder
Wizard of the Moon
Innoruuk
